name: INSetTaskAttributeIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants indicating the state of the response.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The response didnâ€™t specify a response code.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: You are ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: The modification of the task list is still in progress.

items.name: case success
items.desc: You successfully modified the task attributes.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: You were unable to modify the task attributes.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must modify tasks from within your app.
